Policy_Text: All users must have unique IDs and use Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for remote access to the production environment.
All Customer Data at rest must be encrypted using strong cryptography (AES-256 or higher).
Critical vulnerabilities on public-facing assets must be remediated within 48 hours of detection.
System logs must be retained for at least 365 days and reviewed daily for anomalies.
Critical databases must be backed up daily and tested for restoration quarterly.
